information: Universal Organic Company Limited is a company established with the sole purpose of adding commercial value to orange and lemon peels, processing and packaging them for exports to mainly European Region. On demand fresh oranges, mangoes, avocados and other fruits are exported as well. Having built a solid clientele within Europe, America and Asia and by far, our products are certified by ECOCERT and the Ghana Standards Authority. We aim to expand our export network to markets in the USA and Asia , while achieving decent and human workind conditions.
